notes.hashing: Perceptual hashing detects repetition within the system only. Does not claim original source.
notes.reverse_search: Reverse search establishes historical context on the public web. Does not infer private reposts or exact original uploader.
notes.limitations: Hashing answers: 'Has this same media appeared before in our system?'. Reverse search answers: 'Has this media appeared earlier on the public web in a different context?'
